title: How We Work
subtitle: Three-phase approach. Weekly visibility. No surprises.

steps.title: Discovery & Proposal
steps.description: Requirements workshop to map your business needs. Deliverables: scope document, technical design, and fixed-price quote.

steps.title: Development
steps.description: Iterative builds with Friday demos. Code pushed to your GitHub/GitLab daily. You review progress weekly, not at the end.

steps.title: Launch & Transfer
steps.description: UAT on staging, production deployment, monitoring setup. Complete handover: credentials, docs, and training session.
